title: U.S. to Host 2020 G-7 Summit at Trump’s Doral Resort Near Miami
text:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. will host the 2020 Group of Seven summit at President Trump’s luxury golf resort near Miami, his acting chief of staff Mick Mulvaney said, bucking criticism that Mr. Trump is looking to personally profit from the presidency.

Mr. Trump said in August that the Trump National Doral Miami golf resort is an ideal location for the next summit, which the U.S. is hosting next year as part of an annual rotation among member states. Mr. Trump also pushed back on suggestions that he was trying to profit from the...
description: The White House said the U.S. will host the 2020 Group of Seven summit at President Trump’s luxury golf resort near Miami, bucking criticism that Mr. Trump is looking to personally profit from the presidency.
